com.billsbackyardbees.opal.bean

Class PasswordAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.billsbackyardbees.opal.bean.PasswordAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpalDataType, java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class PasswordAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpalDataType
    An user-name with an encrypted password.
    Author:
    Quinn Shultz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PasswordAccount()
      Create a new credential account, may then be populated with a stored account from the database, or completed with new information and stored to the database.
      PasswordAccount(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String URL, java.lang.String username)
      Create a new credential account with specified parameters.
